name: RTFM (LD49)
description:
RTFM is a puzzle game in which an intern at a nuclear power plant is tasked with keeping a nuclear reactor stable.

In order to do so you must check the reactor’s light indicator sequence, read its manual to decipher it and pull the correct levers to stabilize the reactor.

Have fun!

Game created by:

  • @straighter
  • @brooobin

Software used:

  • Godot
  • Aseprite

Audio:

  • 8/16-bit sounds effects pack (@jdwasabi, itch)

Fonts:

  • Monogram (@datagoblin, itch)
  • Pixel Script (wFonts)
